title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 280.1 - Purpose and general description
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 280.1 - Purpose and general description

State Regulations

The purpose of these regulations is to set forth the
administrative process governing the restaurant return-to-work tax credit
program (the program) and specifically to establish an application process, standards for application evaluation and procedures for restaurants claiming
the tax credit under this program. Chapter 59 of the Laws of 2021 establishes
the program and grants the Commissioner of the Department of Economic

Development the authority to promulgate regulations to establish procedures for
the allocation of the restaurant return-to-work tax credit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
280.1

Adopted

New

York State Register December 22, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/22/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
